Text.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1%% [ICON_FOOD] Requis pour la Croissance de la Ville
[ICON_BULLET]Les Villes ont besoin de %d1%% [ICON_FOOD] supplémentaire pour croître
[ICON_BULLET]Les Villes ont besoin de %d1%% [ICON_FOOD] en moins pour croître

TEXT.English: Fixed borders changes cultural borders from being altered by a cities culture, to instead being altered by one's military might.
TEXT.French: Change la manière dont les Frontières sont altérées. La Culture des Villes n'a plus d'influence, c'est la puissance militaire.
TEXT.German: Bei Fixierten Grenzen werden die Kulturgrenzen nicht mehr durch den Kulturwert einer Stadt, sondern durch militärische Macht beeinflussst.
TEXT.Italian: Fixed borders changes cultural borders from being altered by a cities culture, to instead being altered by one's military might.
TEXT.Spanish: Fixed borders changes cultural borders from being altered by a cities culture, to instead being altered by one's military might.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built on a city that is on a peak.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Peut être construit uniquement dans une Ville sur un Sommet.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Kann nur in einer Stadt auf einem Berg gebaut werden.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built on a city that is on a peak.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built on a city that is on a peak.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les Religions se propagent à %d1% du taux normal
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Religionen verbreiten sich zu %d1% der normalen Geschwindigkeit

TEXT.English: Surround and Destroy adds military bonuses for surrounding enemy troops and cities, simulating real world land ambushes
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus militaire pour l'encerclement des troupes ou villes ennemies, simulant les embuscades du monde réel.
TEXT.German: Umzingle und Zerstöre gibt einen militärischen Bonus, wenn feindliche Truppen und Städte umzingelt werden und simuliert damit einen Angriff aus dem Hinterhalt wie im wirklichen Leben.
TEXT.Italian: Surround and Destroy adds military bonuses for surrounding enemy troops and cities, simulating real world land ambushes
TEXT.Spanish: Surround and Destroy adds military bonuses for surrounding enemy troops and cities, simulating real world land ambushes

TEXT.English: Advanced Diplomacy adds new diplomatic trading options, from embassies to trading military and worker units.
TEXT.French: Ajoute de nouvelles options diplomatiques, de l'ambassade aux échange d'unités militaires et civiles.
TEXT.German: Fortgeschrittene Diplomatie führt zu zusätzlichen Diplomatie-Optionen, von Botschaften zum Handel mit Militäreinheiten und Bautrupps.
TEXT.Italian: Advanced Diplomacy adds new diplomatic trading options, from embassies to trading military and worker units.
TEXT.Spanish: Advanced Diplomacy adds new diplomatic trading options, from embassies to trading military and worker units.

TEXT.English: Embassies allow more advanced form of diplomacy.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders [COLOR_REVERT]Agreements.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensive Pacts.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Improves[COLOR_REVERT] Diplomatic Relations Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows For the [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Trade of Workers[COLOR_REVERT] Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows For the [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Trade of Certain Military Units[COLOR_REVERT] Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows players to see inside the other nation's capital city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]If Recalled, Players Will Sour Diplomatic Relations Between Countries.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Enemy Spy Missions are More Likely to Succeed, Due to the Increased Familiarity Between Your Countries.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Allows the other player to see into your capital city![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Les Ambassades permettent une forme plus avancée de diplomatie.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut signer des Traités de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Libre Passage[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut signer des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pactes Défensifs.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Améliore[COLOR_REVERT] les Relations diplomatique entre les Etats.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Permet l'échange d' [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Ouvriers[COLOR_REVERT] entre Etats.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Permet l'échange d' [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Unités militaires[COLOR_REVERT] entre Etats.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Permet aux joueurs de voir la Capitale de l'autre Nation.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Si L'Ambassadeur est rappelé, créé de la tension diplomatique entre les Etats.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Les Missions d'espionnage ont plus de chance de succès, en raison de la proximité entre les Etats.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Votre Capitale est du coup visible par l'autre Nation![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Botschaften ermöglichen eine fortgeschrittenere Form der Diplomatie.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kann [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Offene Grenzen [COLOR_REVERT]beschließen.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kann [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensivpakte[COLOR_REVERT]beschließen.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Verbessert[COLOR_REVERT] diplomatische Beziehungen zwischen den Nationen.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ermöglicht den [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Handel mit Bautrupps[COLOR_REVERT] zwischen den Nationen.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ermöglicht den [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Handel mit bestimmten Militäreinheiten[COLOR_REVERT] zwischen den Nationen. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ermöglicht es den Spielern in die Hauptstadt einer anderen Nation zu sehen.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Wenn der Botschafter abberufen wird verschlechtert dich das diplomatische Verhältnis.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Feindliche Spionagemissionen sind öfter erfolgreich durch die verbesserten Kenntnisse der Länder voneinander.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Ermöglicht es dem anderen Spieler in deine Hauptstadt zu sehen![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: Embassies allow more advanced form of diplomacy.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders [COLOR_REVERT]Agreements.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensive Pacts.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Improves[COLOR_REVERT] Diplomatic Relations Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows For the [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Trade of Workers[COLOR_REVERT] Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows For the [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Trade of Certain Military Units[COLOR_REVERT] Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows players to see inside the other nation's capital city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]If Recalled, Players Will Sour Diplomatic Relations Between Countries.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Enemy Spy Missions are More Likely to Succeed, Due to the Increased Familiarity Between Your Countries.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Allows the other player to see into your capital city![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Embassies allow more advanced form of diplomacy.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders [COLOR_REVERT]Agreements.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensive Pacts.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Improves[COLOR_REVERT] Diplomatic Relations Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows For the [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Trade of Workers[COLOR_REVERT] Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows For the [COLOR_LIGHT_GREEN]Trade of Certain Military Units[COLOR_REVERT] Between Countries.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows players to see inside the other nation's capital city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]If Recalled, Players Will Sour Diplomatic Relations Between Countries.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Enemy Spy Missions are More Likely to Succeed, Due to the Increased Familiarity Between Your Countries.[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Allows the other player to see into your capital city![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: %s1_CivName pledges to vote for %s2_CivName as Secretary General of %s3_VoteSource
TEXT.French: %s1_CivName s'engage à voter pour %s2_CivName en tant que Secrétaire Général de %s3_VoteSource
TEXT.German: %s1_CivName verspricht, für %s2_CivName als Generalsekretär der %s3_VoteSource abzustimmen
TEXT.Italian: %s1_CivName pledges to vote for %s2_CivName as Secretary General of %s3_VoteSource
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CivName pledges to vote for %s2_CivName as Secretary General of %s3_VoteSource

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows for the establishment of an Embassy
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows for the establishment of an Embassy
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows for the establishment of an Embassy

TEXT.English: %d1%: For Having an Embassy in their Nation.
TEXT.French: %d1%: pour avoir une Ambassade dans leur Nation.
TEXT.German: %d1%: Für eine Botschaft in ihrer Nation.
TEXT.Italian: %d1%: For Having an Embassy in their Nation.
TEXT.Spanish: %d1%: For Having an Embassy in their Nation.

TEXT.French: Vous êtes un Seigneur de Guerre!

TEXT.English: You have proven to be committed to peace
TEXT.French: Vous avez prouvé être attaché à la Paix
TEXT.German: Du hast bewiesen, friedliebend zu sein
TEXT.Italian: You have proven to be committed to peace
TEXT.Spanish: You have proven to be committed to peace

TEXT.English: A Right of Passage Agreement allows only non-agressive units to pass through your civilizations, including trade. Useful for when players want to continue trade but stop enemy troop movements.
TEXT.French: Un Droit de Passage permet uniquement aux unités civiles de passer aux travers des frontières des civilisations, incluant le commerce. Pratique lorsque les joueurs veulent continuer les échanges commerciaux tout en stoppant les mouvement de troupes ennemis.
TEXT.German: Eine Passiererlaubnis ermöglicht nichtmilitärischen Einheiten durch Deine Zivilisation zu ziehen und auch den Handel. Das ist sinnvoll für Spieler, die den Handel weiterführen aber den Durchzug der feindlichen Truppen unterbinden möchten.
TEXT.Italian: A Right of Passage Agreement allows only non-agressive units to pass through your civilizations, including trade. Useful for when players want to continue trade but stop enemy troop movements.
TEXT.Spanish: A Right of Passage Agreement allows only non-agressive units to pass through your civilizations, including trade. Useful for when players want to continue trade but stop enemy troop movements.

TEXT.English: Free Trade Agreement:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases Trade Revenue[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lowers the cost of espionage in member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the Spread of Corporations between member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May anger rivals
TEXT.French: Accord de libre échange:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Augmente les revenus des échanges[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Réduit le coût de l'espionnage entre les nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Augmente la propagation des Corporations entre les nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut détériorer les relations avec les rivaux
TEXT.German: Free Trade Agreement:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases Trade Revenue[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lowers the cost of espionage in member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the Spread of Corporations between member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May anger rivals
TEXT.Italian: Free Trade Agreement:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases Trade Revenue[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lowers the cost of espionage in member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the Spread of Corporations between member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May anger rivals
TEXT.Spanish: Free Trade Agreement:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases Trade Revenue[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lowers the cost of espionage in member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases the Spread of Corporations between member nations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May anger rivals

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requiert la présence de votre Religion d'Etat dans cette Ville[COLOR_REVERT][SPACE]

TEXT.English: The normal city governor for human players is replaced with the one the AI uses.
TEXT.French: Le Gouverneur normal utilisé pour les Villes du joueur est remplacé par celui qui est utilisé par l'IA.
TEXT.German: The normal city governor for human players is replaced with the one the AI uses.
TEXT.Italian: The normal city governor for human players is replaced with the one the AI uses.
TEXT.Spanish: The normal city governor for human players is replaced with the one the AI uses.

TEXT.English: All Newly Constructed Units will start fortified in your cities.
TEXT.French: Toutes les Unités nouvellement formées vont automatiquement se fortifier dans vos Villes.
TEXT.German: Alle neu ausgebildeten Einheiten beginnen in Deinen Städten als verschanzte Einheiten.
TEXT.Italian: All Newly Constructed Units will start fortified in your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: All Newly Constructed Units will start fortified in your cities.

TEXT.English: City Governor Builds Workers and Workboats
TEXT.French: Gouverneur de Ville construit Ouvriers et Bâteaux-Atelier
TEXT.Italian: City Governor Builds Workers and Workboats
TEXT.Spanish: City Governor Builds Workers and Workboats

TEXT.English: Automated Cities will Construct Workers and Workboats, when needed.
TEXT.French: Les Gouverneurs des Villes construisent Ouvriers et Bâteaux-Atelier, si nécessaire.
TEXT.German: Automatisierte Städte bauen Bautrupps und Arbeitsboote wenn sie benötigt werden.
TEXT.Italian: Automated Cities will Construct Workers and Workboats, when needed.
TEXT.Spanish: Automated Cities will Construct Workers and Workboats, when needed.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Foreign Trade Route Yield in All Cities

TEXT.English: Removes the restriction on the number of wonders that can be built in one city
TEXT.French: Enlève la restriction du nombre de Merveilles que peut construire une Ville
TEXT.German: Entfernt die Begrenzung der Anzahl von Wundern, die in einer Stadt gebaut werden können
TEXT.Italian: Removes the restriction on the number of wonders that can be built in one city
TEXT.Spanish: Removes the restriction on the number of wonders that can be built in one city

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires at least a city of size %d1[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The evil %s1_CivAdj have convinced the treacherous %s2_CivAdj to declare war on us!
TEXT.French: Les sournois %s1_CivAdj ont convaincu les traîtres %s2_CivAdj de nous déclarer la Guerre!
TEXT.German: Die bösartigen %s1_CivAdj haben die hinterhältigen %s2_CivAdj davon überzeugt, uns den Krieg zu erklären!
TEXT.Italian: The evil %s1_CivAdj have convinced the treacherous %s2_CivAdj to declare war on us!
TEXT.Spanish: The evil %s1_CivAdj have convinced the treacherous %s2_CivAdj to declare war on us!

Text.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1%% de Défense dans toutes les Villes

TEXT.English: Enables XP and Great Generals from Barbarian Combat, but be warned, the Barbarians can receive Great Generals now too!
TEXT.French: Permet de l'expérience et des Grands Généraux lors des combat contre les Barbares. Mais attention, les Barbares pourront avoir des Généraux également!
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Erfahrungspunkte und Große Generäle aus Kämpfen mit Barbaren. Aber sei gewarnt, die Barbaren können jetzt auch Große Generäle bekommen!
TEXT.Italian: Enables XP and Great Generals from Barbarian Combat, but be warned, the Barbarians can receive Great Generals now too!
TEXT.Spanish: Enables XP and Great Generals from Barbarian Combat, but be warned, the Barbarians can receive Great Generals now too!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Donne à votre Civilisation des Frontières fixes
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET] Bewirkt fixierte Grenzen für Deine Zivilisation
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Causes your Civilization to have Fixed Borders
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Causes your Civilization to have Fixed Borders

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPY] Bonus pour toutes les Civilisations, sauf [LINK=literal]%s1_CivicName[\LINK]

TEXT.English: %d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We Enjoy Our Freedom from the Oppression of %s2_Name!"
TEXT.French: %d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "Nous nous réjouissons d'avoir échapé à l'oppresion de %s2_Name!"
TEXT.German: %d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "Wir genießen die Abwesenheit der Unterdrückung durch %s2_Name!"
TEXT.Italian: %d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We Enjoy Our Freedom from the Oppression of %s2_Name!"
TEXT.Spanish: %d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We Enjoy Our Freedom from the Oppression of %s2_Name!"

TEXT.English: When a player has enough beakers to research more than one technology, and more than one technology is queued, they can research multiple technologies per turn.
TEXT.French: Lorsque un joueur a assez de points pour rechercher plus d'une technologie, il peut découvrir plusieurs Technologies par tour.
TEXT.German: Wenn ein Spieler genügend Forschungspunkte erreicht hat, um mehr als eine Technologie zu erforschen und mindestens eine weitere vorausgewählt ist, so können mehrere Technologien pro Runde erforscht werden.
TEXT.Italian: When a player has enough beakers to research more than one technology, and more than one technology is queued, they can research multiple technologies per turn.
TEXT.Spanish: When a player has enough beakers to research more than one technology, and more than one technology is queued, they can research multiple technologies per turn.

TEXT.English: This order will increase the cities food supply. It consumes the unit.
TEXT.French: Cet Ordre va accroitre la réserve de nourriture des Villes. L'unité est détruite.
TEXT.German: Dieser Befehl wird die Nahrungsmittelvorräte in der Stadt erhöhen. Die Einheit wird dabei verbraucht.
TEXT.Italian: This order will increase the cities food supply. It consumes the unit.
TEXT.Spanish: This order will increase the cities food supply. It consumes the unit.

TEXT.English: Your People Are Unhappy about Higher Taxes! They Have Taken to the Streets to Protest!
TEXT.French: Votre peuple est mécontent des Taxes élevées! Ils sont descendus dans les rues pour protester!
TEXT.German: Deine Bürger sind unzufrieden mit den erhöhten Steuern! Sie sind auf der Straße und protestieren!
TEXT.Italian: Your People Are Unhappy about Higher Taxes! They Have Taken to the Streets to Protest!
TEXT.Spanish: Your People Are Unhappy about Higher Taxes! They Have Taken to the Streets to Protest!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Augmenter les Taxes va engendrer du Désordre Civil![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Disables The Use and Training of Warlord and Warlord (S) Units
TEXT.French: Désactive l'utilisation et la formation de d'unités Seigneur de Guerre (Warlords)
TEXT.German: Schaltet die Verwendung und Ausbildung von Kriegsherren- und Kriegsherren-(S)-Einheiten aus
TEXT.Italian: Disables The Use and Training of Warlord and Warlord (S) Units
TEXT.Spanish: Disables The Use and Training of Warlord and Warlord (S) Units

TEXT.English: Captured cities retain their original civilization, so they can build that Civ's UU's and Unique Buildings.
TEXT.French: Les Villes Capturées gardent leur civilisation d'origine, et peuvent ainsi toujours construire les bâtiments et unités uniques.
TEXT.German: Eroberte Städte behalten ihre ursprüngliche Zivilisation, so dass sie Spezialeinheiten und -gebäude dieser Zivilisation errichten können.
TEXT.Italian: Captured cities retain their original civilization, so they can build that Civ's UU's and Unique Buildings.
TEXT.Spanish: Captured cities retain their original civilization, so they can build that Civ's UU's and Unique Buildings.

TEXT.English: Difficulty level is adjusted every 50 turns. (on Normal Speed) If your score is in the top third the difficulty increases, if you are in the bottom third the difficulty decreases. Single player only.
TEXT.French: Les Niveau de Difficulté est ajusté tous les 50 tours. (vitesse Normale). Si votre score est dans le Top 3, la difficulté augmente, et si vous êtes dans le Down 3, elle diminue. Uniquement en mode Solo.
TEXT.German: Der Schwierigkeitsgrad wird alle 50 Runden angepasst. Wenn Dein Punktestand im oberen Drittel liegt, so erhöht sich die Schwierigkeit, im unteren Drittel senkt sie sich. Nur für den Einzelspielermodus.
TEXT.Italian: Difficulty level is adjusted every 50 turns. (on Normal Speed) If your score is in the top third the difficulty increases, if you are in the bottom third the difficulty decreases. Single player only.
TEXT.Spanish: Difficulty level is adjusted every 50 turns. (on Normal Speed) If your score is in the top third the difficulty increases, if you are in the bottom third the difficulty decreases. Single player only.

TEXT.English: Every 50 turns (on Normal Speed) the player with the lowest score is removed from the game until only 5 players remain. Not meant for use with BarbarianCiv or Revolutions!
TEXT.French: Tous les 50 tours (vitesse Normale) Le Joueur avec le plus petit score est retiré du jeu, jusqu'à ce qu'il ne reste que 5 Joueurs. Ne pas utiliser avec les Mods 'BarbarianCiv' ou 'Revolutions'!
TEXT.German: Alle 50 Runden (bei normaler Spielgeschwindigkeit) wird der Spieler mit dem niedrigsten Punktestand entfernt bis nur noch 5 Spieler übrigbleiben. Nicht gedacht für die Kombination mit Barbaren-Zivilisation oder Revolutionen!
TEXT.Italian: Every 50 turns (on Normal Speed) the player with the lowest score is removed from the game until only 5 players remain. Not meant for use with BarbarianCiv or Revolutions!
TEXT.Spanish: Every 50 turns (on Normal Speed) the player with the lowest score is removed from the game until only 5 players remain. Not meant for use with BarbarianCiv or Revolutions!

TEXT.English: Become the player with the highest score, then you switch to controlling the civilization with the lowest score. Raise that civilization to have the highest score and you will be switched again to civilization with the lowest score. That third civilization will be the one you have to win the game with. Single player only.
TEXT.French: Par deux fois, le fait d'être le Joueur avec le plus grand score vous fait changer de civilisation pour contrôler celle possédant le score le plus bas. La troisième civilisation sera celle avec laquelle il vous faudra gagner le jeu. Uniquement en mode Solo.
TEXT.German: Wenn Du der Spieler mit dem höchsten Punktestand bist, so erhältst Du die Kontrolle der Zivilisation mit den wenigsten Punkten. Wenn es Dir gelingt wieder an die Spitze der Punkteliste zu kommen, so wirst Du nochmals mit der niedrigsten Zivilisation tauschen. Mit dieser dritten Zivilisation musst Du dann das Spiel gewinnen. Nur im Einzelspieler-Modus.
TEXT.Italian: Become the player with the highest score, then you switch to controlling the civilization with the lowest score. Raise that civilization to have the highest score and you will be switched again to civilization with the lowest score. That third civilization will be the one you have to win the game with. Single player only.
TEXT.Spanish: Become the player with the highest score, then you switch to controlling the civilization with the lowest score. Raise that civilization to have the highest score and you will be switched again to civilization with the lowest score. That third civilization will be the one you have to win the game with. Single player only.

TEXT.English: Every 50 turns (on Normal Speed) the games difficulty is increased by 1 until it reaches Deity.
TEXT.French: Chaque 50 tours (vitesse normale) la difficulté du jeu est augmentées d'un niveau jusqu'à atteindre 'Divin'.
TEXT.German: Alle 50 Runden (bei normaler Spielgeschwindigkeit) wird die Spielstufe um eine Stufe erhöht bis "Kaiser" erreicht ist.
TEXT.Italian: Every 50 turns (on Normal Speed) the games difficulty is increased by 1 until it reaches Deity.
TEXT.Spanish: Every 50 turns (on Normal Speed) the games difficulty is increased by 1 until it reaches Deity.

TEXT.French: Joueur en dernière position éliminé dans %d1 tours
TEXT.German: Schwächster Spieler wird in %d1 Runden entfernt

TEXT.English: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 1/3)
TEXT.French: Premier au Dernier: Atteindre le meilleur score (Etape 1/3)
TEXT.German: Hoch und Niedrig: Erreiche den höchsten Punktestand (Stufe 1 von 3)
TEXT.Italian: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 1/3)
TEXT.Spanish: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 1/3)

TEXT.English: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 2/3)
TEXT.French: Premier au Dernier: Atteindre le meilleur score (Etape 2/3)
TEXT.German: Hoch und Niedrig: Erreiche den höchsten Punktestand (Stufe 2 von 3)
TEXT.Italian: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 2/3)
TEXT.Spanish: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 2/3)

TEXT.English: High To Low: Conditions met, now win the game! (stage 3/3)
TEXT.French: Premier au Dernier: Objectifs atteints, Maintenant, Il faut Gagner! (Etape 3/3)
TEXT.German: Hoch und Niedrig: Vorgaben erreicht, jetzt gewinne das Spiel! (Stufe 3 von 3)
TEXT.Italian: High To Low: Conditions met, now win the game! (stage 3/3)
TEXT.Spanish: High To Low: Conditions met, now win the game! (stage 3/3)

TEXT.English: The Weakest Player has been Dropped from the Game! Stay in the top five to stay Alive!
TEXT.French: Le Joueur en dernière position a été éliminé du Jeu! Restez dans le Top 5 pour Survivre!
TEXT.German: Der schwächste Mitspieler wurde aus dem Spiel genommen! Bleibe in den Top Five um zu überleben!
TEXT.Italian: The Weakest Player has been Dropped from the Game! Stay in the top five to stay Alive!
TEXT.Spanish: The Weakest Player has been Dropped from the Game! Stay in the top five to stay Alive!

TEXT.English: You have been Re-Assigned to the Weakest Team! Turn this nation around and become #1 again!
TEXT.French: Vous avez été transféré dans la plus faible Equipe! Faites prospérer cette Nation et devenez N°1 à nouveau!
TEXT.German: Du wurdest dem schwächsten Team zugeteilt! Jetzt mache aus dieser Nation wieder die Nr. 1!
TEXT.Italian: You have been Re-Assigned to the Weakest Team! Turn this nation around and become #1 again!
TEXT.Spanish: You have been Re-Assigned to the Weakest Team! Turn this nation around and become #1 again!

TEXT.English: When Players use Civics that enable Elections, leaders will have to face off oppponets in re-occuring elections. Winning allows for continued rein of the country, losing means waiting until the next election!
TEXT.French: Lorsque les Joueurs utilisent des Doctrines qui permettent les Elections, les Leaders sont confrontés à des opposants de manière récurente. Une Victoire aux élections vont permet de continuer à diriger l'Empire, une défaite vous obligera à attendre les élections suivantes!
TEXT.German: Wenn der Spieler Staatsformen verwendet, bei denen Wahlen stattfinden, so muss er sich regelmäßig Gegnern stellen, um beim Volk Stimmen zu sammeln. Bei einem Wahlsieg darf das Land weiter regiert werden, bei einer Niederlage muss auf die nächste Wahl gewartet werden!
TEXT.Italian: When Players use Civics that enable Elections, leaders will have to face off oppponets in re-occuring elections. Winning allows for continued rein of the country, losing means waiting until the next election!
TEXT.Spanish: When Players use Civics that enable Elections, leaders will have to face off oppponets in re-occuring elections. Winning allows for continued rein of the country, losing means waiting until the next election!

TEXT.English: Your %s1 has been Exhausted of Useful Material!
TEXT.German: In Ihrer %s1 wurde alles verwertbare Material aufgebraucht!
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1 has been Exhausted of Useful Material!
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1 has been Exhausted of Useful Material!

TEXT.English: The %s1 in your %s2 has been exhausted!
TEXT.Italian: The %s1 in your %s2 has been exhausted!
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1 in your %s2 has been exhausted!

TEXT.English: Lowers The Risk of Revolution in the City
TEXT.French: Diminue le risque de Révolution dans la Ville
TEXT.German: Verringert das Risiko einer Revolution in dieser Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Lowers The Risk of Revolution in the City
TEXT.Spanish: Lowers The Risk of Revolution in the City

TEXT.English: Lowers The Risk of Revolution in all cities
TEXT.French: Diminue le risque de Révolution dans toutes les Villes
TEXT.German: Verringert das Risiko einer Revolution in allen Städten.
TEXT.Italian: Lowers The Risk of Revolution in all cities
TEXT.Spanish: Lowers The Risk of Revolution in all cities

TEXT.English: Expect to spend all of time completing these games!
TEXT.French: Attendez-vous à passer tout votre temps pour finir ces parties!
TEXT.German: Rechne damit, unendliche Zeiten bis zur Vollendung dieses Spieles zu benötigen!
TEXT.Italian: Expect to spend all of time completing these games!
TEXT.Spanish: Expect to spend all of time completing these games!

TEXT.English: A nuclear explosion from an unknown source has occured in %s1's territory!
TEXT.French: Une explosion nucléaire d'origine inconnue s'est produite dans le territoire %s1!
TEXT.German: Eine nukleare Explosion unbekannten Ursprungs fand im Territorium von %s1 statt!
TEXT.Italian: A nuclear explosion from an unknown source has occured in %s1's territory!
TEXT.Spanish: A nuclear explosion from an unknown source has occured in %s1's territory!

TEXT.English: A %s1 spy set off a nuclear device in %s2's territory!
TEXT.French: Un espion %s1 a déclenché une arme nucléaire dans le Territoire %s2!
TEXT.German: Ein %s1 Spion hat im Territorium von %s2 einen nuklearen Sprengkörper gezündet!
TEXT.Italian: A %s1 spy set off a nuclear device in %s2's territory!
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1 spy set off a nuclear device in %s2's territory!

TEXT.English: Dark Ages are the opposite of Golden Ages. They occur to large empires as they stagnate and grow slower and slower, compared to their youthful counterparts. In a Dark Age, yields decrease, cities grow slower, and the populace is more rebellous.
TEXT.French: Les Ages Sombres sont l'opposé des Ages d'Or. Il arrivent lorsque de large Empires stagnent et croissent de plus en plus lentement par rapport à leur rivaux. Dans les Ages Sombres, la productivité décroît, les Villes croissent plus lentement, et la population est plus rebelle.
TEXT.German: Dunkle Zeitalter sind das Gegenteil von Goldenen Zeitaltern. Sie treten in großen Imperien auf, wenn sie im Vergleich zu ihren jüngeren Kontrahenten stagnieren und immer langsamer wachsen. In einem dunklen Zeitalter verringern sich die Erträge, Städte wachsen langsamer und die Bevölkerung ist rebellischer.
TEXT.Italian: Dark Ages are the opposite of Golden Ages. They occur to large empires as they stagnate and grow slower and slower, compared to their youthful counterparts. In a Dark Age, yields decrease, cities grow slower, and the populace is more rebellous.
TEXT.Spanish: Dark Ages are the opposite of Golden Ages. They occur to large empires as they stagnate and grow slower and slower, compared to their youthful counterparts. In a Dark Age, yields decrease, cities grow slower, and the populace is more rebellous.

TEXT.French: L'Age Sombre de %s1_PlyrName Dark Age a commencé!!!
L'Age Sombre de %s1_PlyrName est à présent terminé...
La Depression de %s1_PlyrName's a pris fin...

TEXT.English: Avoid angry citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for happy citizens.
TEXT.French: Evite les Citoyens mécontents, en limitant la croissance lorsque la capacité de contenter les citoyens n'est adéquate.
TEXT.German: Vermeidet unzufriedene Untertanen. Wächst nicht über die Obergrenze für zufriedene Untertanen hinaus.
TEXT.Italian: Avoid angry citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for happy citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: Avoid angry citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for happy citizens.

TEXT.English: Avoid unhealty citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for healthy citizens.
TEXT.French: Evite les Citoyens en mauvaise Santé, en limitant la croissance tant que les conditions sanitaires suffisantes ne sont pas réunies.
TEXT.German: Vermeidet kranke Untertanen. Wächst nicht über die Obergrenze für gesunde Untertanen hinaus.
TEXT.Italian: Avoid unhealty citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for healthy citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: Avoid unhealty citizens by not growing beyond the capacity for healthy citizens.

TEXT.English: Ruthless AI is a step up from Aggresive AI. The AI will be more backstabbing, less predictable, more ready to declare war on everyone, less likely to forgive past slights, and will trade with your worst enemies, just to spite you. Expect no mercy, for you shall receive none!
TEXT.French: IA Sans merci est le niveau au-dessus de l'IA Aggressive. L'IA est plus sournoise, moins prévisible, prête à déclarer la Guerre à tout moment, ne pardonne pas, et va commercer avec vos pires ennemis, juste pour vous déstabiliser. N'attendez aucune pitié, vous n'en recevrez pas!
TEXT.German: Skrupellose KI geht einen Schritt weiter als Agressive KI. Die KI wird hinterhältiger sein, schlechter ausrechenbar, schneller Kriege erklären, frühere Vergehen weniger schnell vergessen, und wird mit Deinen schlimmsten Feinden handeln, nur aus Boshaftigkeit Dir gegenüber. Erwarte keine Gnade, denn es wird für Dich keine geben!
TEXT.Italian: Ruthless AI is a step up from Aggresive AI. The AI will be more backstabbing, less predictable, more ready to declare war on everyone, less likely to forgive past slights, and will trade with your worst enemies, just to spite you. Expect no mercy, for you shall receive none!
TEXT.Spanish: Ruthless AI is a step up from Aggresive AI. The AI will be more backstabbing, less predictable, more ready to declare war on everyone, less likely to forgive past slights, and will trade with your worst enemies, just to spite you. Expect no mercy, for you shall receive none!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente la Ligne de Vue de la Ville
[ICON_BULLET]Diminue la Ligne de Vue de la Ville

TEXT.English: Great Commanders give Great Generals many bonuses for leading troops into battle, instead of just attaching to a squad of existing troops.
TEXT.French: Les Commandants Illustres donne aux Généraux Illustres de nombreux bonus au combat, au lieu de ne faire que s'associer à une unité.
TEXT.German: Große Anführer geben Großen Generälen viele Boni im Kampf anstatt sich lediglich einer Anzahl von bestehenden Truppen anzuschließen.
TEXT.Italian: Great Commanders give Great Generals many bonuses for leading troops into battle, instead of just attaching to a squad of existing troops.
TEXT.Spanish: Great Commanders give Great Generals many bonuses for leading troops into battle, instead of just attaching to a squad of existing troops.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Supprime les Restrictions de Portée du Largage
[ICON_BULLET]%d1%% de Revenus des routes commerciales étrangères
Déteriore les Relations des Joueurs utilisant:[SPACE]
TEXT.German: Schädigt die Beziehungen zu Spielern mit:[SPACE]

TEXT.French: Améliore les Relations des Joueurs utilisant:[SPACE]
TEXT.German: Verbessert die Beziehungen zu Spielern mit:[SPACE]

TEXT.French: Emplacements en fonction des Liens Culturels

TEXT.English: Reassigns all starting locations according to the distances between civilizations on earth.
TEXT.French: Réassigne toutes les positions de départ en fonction de la distance entre les civilisation sur Terre.
TEXT.German: Richtet die Startposition aller Spieler nach der Lage der Zivilisationen auf der Erde aus.
TEXT.Italian: Reassigns all starting locations according to the distances between civilizations on earth.
TEXT.Spanish: Reassigns all starting locations according to the distances between civilizations on earth.

TEXT.English: Your %s1_unit has been promoted to %s2_promotion in battle.
TEXT.French: Votre %s1_unit a été promu en %s2_promotion durant le combat.
TEXT.German: Dein %s1_unit wurde im Kampf zu %s2_promotion befördert.
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1_unit has been promoted to %s2_promotion in battle.
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1_unit has been promoted to %s2_promotion in battle.

TEXT.English: Names key map locations, mountain ranges, deserts, forests, jungles, etc... on the game loadup.
TEXT.French: Attribue des noms aux emplacements-clés de la carte, Chaînes de montage, déserts, forêts, jungles, au chargement du Jeu.
TEXT.German: Benennt Schlüssellagen auf der Landkarte, Gebirgszüge, Wüsten, Wälder, Dschungel, usw. während das Spiel geladen wird.
TEXT.Italian: Names key map locations, mountain ranges, deserts, forests, jungles, etc... on the game loadup.
TEXT.Spanish: Names key map locations, mountain ranges, deserts, forests, jungles, etc... on the game loadup.

TEXT.English: Your Score exceeds the mercy rule limit! You will win the game in %d1 turns!
TEXT.French: Votre Score dépasse la limite fixée pour la règle de grâce! Vous allez gagner dans %d1 tours!
TEXT.German: Dein Spielstand überschreitet den Wert der Gnadenherrschaft! Du wirst das Spiel in %d1 Runden gewinnen!
TEXT.Italian: Your Score exceeds the mercy rule limit! You will win the game in %d1 turns!
TEXT.Spanish: Your Score exceeds the mercy rule limit! You will win the game in %d1 turns!

TEXT.English: Another players score has exceeded the mercy rule limit! You will lose the game in %d1 turns if you don't improve your score!
TEXT.French: Le score d'un autre Joueur a dépassé la règle de grâce ! Vous allez perdre le Jeu dans %d1 tours si vous n'augmentez pas votre score!
TEXT.German: Der Spielstand eines anderen Spielers überschreitet den Wert der Gnadenherrschaft! Du wirst das Spiel in %d1 Runden verlieren, wenn Du Deine Wertung nicht verbesserst!
TEXT.Italian: Another players score has exceeded the mercy rule limit! You will lose the game in %d1 turns if you don't improve your score!
TEXT.Spanish: Another players score has exceeded the mercy rule limit! You will lose the game in %d1 turns if you don't improve your score!

TEXT.English: Mercy Rule in effect! You will lose in %d1 [NUM1:turn:turns]!!!
TEXT.French: Règle de Grâce ! Vous allez perdre dans %d1 [NUM1:tour:tours]!!!
TEXT.German: Gnadenherrschaft hat begonnen! Du wirst in %d1 [NUM1:Runde:Runden] verlieren!!!
TEXT.Italian: Mercy Rule in effect! You will lose in %d1 [NUM1:turn:turns]!!!
TEXT.Spanish: Mercy Rule in effect! You will lose in %d1 [NUM1:turn:turns]!!!

TEXT.English: The Mercy Rule Countdown has been aborted! The Normal Game Continues...
TEXT.French: Compte à rebours pour la règle de Grâce annulé! Le Jeu continue normalement...
TEXT.German: Der Countdown der Gnadenherrschaft wurde abgebrochen! Das normale Spiel geht weiter...
TEXT.Italian: The Mercy Rule Countdown has been aborted! The Normal Game Continues...
TEXT.Spanish: The Mercy Rule Countdown has been aborted! The Normal Game Continues...

TEXT.English: You have discovered a new landmark!
TEXT.French: Vous avez découvert un nouveau Lieu référencé!
TEXT.German: Du hast eine neue Landmarke entdeckt!
TEXT.Italian: You have discovered a new landmark!
TEXT.Spanish: You have discovered a new landmark!

TEXT.English: Will awaken when it has accrued the maximum possible espionage points
TEXT.French: Se réveillera lorsqu'il aura atteint le maximum possible de points d'espionnage
TEXT.German: Wird aufwachen, wenn sie die maximal mögliche Zahl an Spionagepunkten erreicht hat
TEXT.Italian: Will awaken when it has accrued the maximum possible espionage points
TEXT.Spanish: Will awaken when it has accrued the maximum possible espionage points

TEXT.English: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus
TEXT.French: Cette Unité va récolter des Informations et devenir à nouveau active lorsqu'elle aura atteint son bonus maximum d'espionnage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit wird Informationen sammeln und nicht aufwachen bis sie ihr Maximum an Spionagepunkten erreicht hat
TEXT.Italian: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus
TEXT.Spanish: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built and operated during Wartime[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Peut uniquement être construit et utilisé en temps de Guerre[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Kann nur in Kriegszeiten gebaut und benutzt werden[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built and operated during Wartime[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built and operated during Wartime[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: Réduire les habitants de la Ville à l'esclavage!

TEXT.English: You have sacked the city of %s1_cityname!
TEXT.French: Vous avez saccagé la Ville de %s1_cityname!
TEXT.Italian: You have sacked the city of %s1_cityname!
TEXT.Spanish: You have sacked the city of %s1_cityname!

TEXT.English: The city of %s1_cityname has been sacked by %s2_civilization!!!
TEXT.French: La Ville de %s1_cityname a été saccagée par %s2_civilization!!!
TEXT.Italian: The city of %s1_cityname has been sacked by %s2_civilization!!!
TEXT.Spanish: The city of %s1_cityname has been sacked by %s2_civilization!!!

TEXT.English: %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD] has been seized from the city of %s1_cityname!
TEXT.French: %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD] ont été saisis de la Ville de %s1_cityname!
TEXT.Italian: %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD] has been siezed from the city of %s1_cityname!
TEXT.Spanish: %d2_gold[ICON_GOLD] has been siezed from the city of %s1_cityname!

TEXT.French: Vous avez saccagé notre Ville Sainte!
TEXT.German: Ihr habt unsere Heilige Stadt geplündert!

TEXT.English: You have enslaved the citizens of %s1_cityname!
TEXT.French: Vous avez réduit à l'esclavage des habitants de %s1_cityname!
TEXT.German: Ihr habt die Einwohner von %s1_cityname versklavt!
TEXT.Italian: You have enslaved the citizens of %s1_cityname!
TEXT.Spanish: You have enslaved the citizens of %s1_cityname!

TEXT.English: The citizens of %s1_cityname have been enslaved by %s2_civilization!!!
TEXT.French: Les habitants de %s1_cityname ont été réduits à l'esclavage par %s2_civilization!!!
TEXT.German: Die Einwohner von %s1_cityname wurden von %s2_civilization versklavt!!!
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of %s1_cityname have been enslaved by %s2_civilization!!!
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of %s1_cityname have been enslaved by %s2_civilization!!!

TEXT.French: Vous avez fait de nos Citoyens des esclaves!

TEXT.English: We can no longer stand by and watch the carnage! You must end your war with the %s1!
TEXT.French: Nous ne pouvons plus rester là et regarde le carnage! Vous devez arrêter votre Guerre contre %s1!
TEXT.German: Wir können dem Gemetzel nicht länger zusehen und tatenlos bleiben! Ihr müßt den Krieg mit den %s1 beenden!
TEXT.Italian: We can no longer stand by and watch the carnage! You must end your war with the %s1!
TEXT.Spanish: We can no longer stand by and watch the carnage! You must end your war with the %s1!

TEXT.English: The war has gone on long enough! Make peace with %s1.
TEXT.French: La Guerre a durée assez longtemps! Faire la paix avec %s1.
TEXT.German: Der Krieg hat lange genug gedauert! Macht Frieden mit %s1.
TEXT.Italian: The war has gone on long enough! Make peace with %s1.
TEXT.Spanish: The war has gone on long enough! Make peace with %s1.

TEXT.English: No! They must be taught a lesson!
TEXT.French: Non! Il faut leur donner une leçon!
TEXT.German: Nein! Sie müssen ihre Lektion lernen!
TEXT.Italian: No! They must be taught a lesson!
TEXT.Spanish: No! They must be taught a lesson!

TEXT.German: Manche Kriege sind es wert zu kämpfen...

TEXT.English: Not until their blood fills the streets of their capital city!
TEXT.French: Pas avant que leur sang remplisse les rues de leur Capitale!
TEXT.German: Nicht bis das Blut die Straßen ihrer Hauptstadt füllt!
TEXT.Italian: Not until their blood fills the streets of their capital city!
TEXT.Spanish: Not until their blood fills the streets of their capital city!

TEXT.French: N'abandonnerai Jamais! Jamais je ne me rendrai!

TEXT.English: Your inhumanity will not be soon forgotten...
TEXT.French: Votre inhumanité ne sera pas oubliée de si tôt...
TEXT.German: Eure Unmenschlichkeit wird nicht leicht vergessen werden...
TEXT.Italian: Your inhumanity will not be soon forgotten...
TEXT.Spanish: Your inhumanity will not be soon forgotten...

TEXT.English: Loyalty with Honor, Courage with Valor, Warmongering with Wrath, and Folly with Doom!
TEXT.French: Fidélité avec honneur, Courage avec Valeur, Bellicisme avec Colère, et Folie avec Destruction!
TEXT.German: Loyalität mit Ehre, Mut mit Tapferkeit, Kriegstreiberei mit Zorn, und Torheit mit Untergang!
TEXT.Italian: Loyalty with Honor, Courage with Valor, Warmongering with Wrath, and Folly with Doom!
TEXT.Spanish: Loyalty with Honor, Courage with Valor, Warmongering with Wrath, and Folly with Doom!

TEXT.English: This will be the undoing of us all!
TEXT.French: Ce sera la défaite de nous tous!
TEXT.German: Das bedeutet das Ende für uns alle!
TEXT.Italian: This will be the undoing of us all!
TEXT.Spanish: This will be the undoing of us all!

TEXT.English: In some sinister plot, the %s1 have introduced some shady ambassadors who claim to hail from the %s2 to us.
TEXT.French: Dans un sinistre complot, les %s1 nous ont introduit auprès Ambassadeurs de l'ombre qui réclament la grêle de la part des %s2.
TEXT.German: In einer undurchsichtigen Verschwörung haben die %s1 einige dubiose Abgesandte vorgestellt, die behaupten, Grüße der %s2 zu überbringen.
TEXT.Italian: In some sinister plot, the %s1 have introduced some shady ambassadors who claim to hail from the %s2 to us.
TEXT.Spanish: In some sinister plot, the %s1 have introduced some shady ambassadors who claim to hail from the %s2 to us.

TEXT.English: Out of spite, the %s1 have introduced the ambassadors of the %s2 to us.
TEXT.French: Par dépit, les %s1 nous ont introduits auprès des Ambassadeurs de %s2.
TEXT.German: Aus reiner Gehässigkeit haben uns die %s1 Abgesandte der %s2 vorgestellt.

TEXT.English: Culture spreads from Cities in a more realistic fashion, over low lying areas more quickly than peaks, hills, or jungles.
TEXT.French: L'expansion de Culture des Villes s'opère de manière plus réaliste, de manière régulière, et sur les zones accessibles plus rapidement que sur les collines ou les Jungles.
TEXT.German: Kultur breitet sich aus Städten in realistischerer Weise aus, schneller im Flachland, langsamer in Bergen, Hügeln oder Dschungel.
TEXT.Italian: Culture spreads from Cities in a more realistic fashion, over low lying areas more quickly than peaks, hills, or jungles.
TEXT.Spanish: Culture spreads from Cities in a more realistic fashion, over low lying areas more quickly than peaks, hills, or jungles.

TEXT.English: Your nation has the unique oppertunity to mint it's own currency. Only resources that are readily available to your empire are elgible. The local favorites have already been pre-selected by your advisor, and they just need your final decision and approval.
TEXT.French: Votre Nation a l'opportunité de frapper sa propre monnaie. Vous seul disposez des ressources nécessaire. Les effigies ont déjà été pré-sélectionnées par votre Conseiller. Il manque uniquement votre consentement.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut entraîner des Unités pour propager les Corporations

TEXT.English: Corporations will expand and grow dynamically, without player involvement, behaving more like real world Corporations, and not tied to central governments. Corporations can be taxed for a profit, or be subsidized by your nation to help it expand faster. It reduces the tedious micromanagement of corporations, and gives corporate policies real value and meaning.
TEXT.French: Les Corporations s'étendent et se développement sans l'intervention du joueur, se comportement de manière plus réaliste par rapport au mont réel, sans influence des gouvernements. Les Corporations peuvent être taxées, ou subventionnées par notre nation pour accroitre son expansion.
TEXT.German: Corporations will expand and grow dynamically, without player involvement, behaving more like real world Corporations, and not tied to central governments. Corporations can be taxed for a profit, or be subsidized by your nation to help it expand faster. It reduces the tedious micromanagement of corporations, and gives corporate policies real value and meaning.
TEXT.Italian: Corporations will expand and grow dynamically, without player involvement, behaving more like real world Corporations, and not tied to central governments. Corporations can be taxed for a profit, or be subsidized by your nation to help it expand faster. It reduces the tedious micromanagement of corporations, and gives corporate policies real value and meaning.
TEXT.Spanish: Corporations will expand and grow dynamically, without player involvement, behaving more like real world Corporations, and not tied to central governments. Corporations can be taxed for a profit, or be subsidized by your nation to help it expand faster. It reduces the tedious micromanagement of corporations, and gives corporate policies real value and meaning.

TEXT.English: Cities with many religions may have less popular ones slowly decay.
TEXT.French: Les Villes avec plusieurs religions peuvent voir leur influence décroître. Les religions les moins populaires sont amenées à disparaitre lentement.
TEXT.German: Cities with many religions may have less popular ones slowly decay.
TEXT.Italian: Cities with many religions may have less popular ones slowly decay.
TEXT.Spanish: Cities with many religions may have less popular ones slowly decay.

TEXT.English: Barbarians can not keep captured cities, and will always raze them.
TEXT.French: Les Barbares ne gardent pas les ville capturées, mais les pillent et les rasent systématiquement.
TEXT.German: Barbarians can not keep captured cities, and will always raze them.
TEXT.Italian: Barbarians can not keep captured cities, and will always raze them.
TEXT.Spanish: Barbarians can not keep captured cities, and will always raze them.

TEXT.English: The United Nations and Apostilitic Palace can still be built, even when diplomatic victory is not enabled. Players will be able to hold UN elections, but can not win by becoming the Secretary General.
TEXT.French: Les Nations Unies et le Palais Apostolique peuvent être construit même si la victoire diplomatique n'est pas activée. Les Joueurs peuvent conduire des Elections, mais ne gagneront pas en étant élu Secrétaire général.
TEXT.German: The United Nations and Apostilitic Palace can still be built, even when diplomatic victory is not enabled. Players will be able to hold UN elections, but can not win by becoming the Secretary General.

TEXT.Spanish: The United Nations and Apostilitic Palace can still be built, even when diplomatic victory is not enabled. Players will be able to hold UN elections, but can not win by becoming the Secretary General.

TEXT.French: Les Citoyens de %s1 se soulèvent et pillent la Ville à la suite de l'accusation proférée par un espion de %s2 concernant la mort du Gouverneur, apparemment tué par une faction rebelle.
TEXT.German: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.
TEXT.Italian: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.
TEXT.Spanish: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.

TEXT.English: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.French: L'Electricité de la Ville de %s1 a été restaurée.
TEXT.German: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.Italian: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.Spanish: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.

TEXT.English: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.
TEXT.French: Les Centrales électriques de la Ville de %s1 ont été désactivées. On suspecte l'intervention d'un espion de %s2.
TEXT.German: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.
TEXT.Italian: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.
TEXT.Spanish: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.

TEXT.English: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.
TEXT.French: Un défaut d'un générateur d'une centrale électrique de la Ville de %s1 a conduit à une coupure de l'électricité.
TEXT.German: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.
TEXT.Italian: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.
TEXT.Spanish: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.

TEXT.English: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.French: Des espions %s1 infiltrés ont apporté leur soutien aux rebelles dans notre territoire!!
TEXT.German: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!

TEXT.English: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.French: Permet des actes offensifs importants pour les espions, comme le sabotage nucléaire, le soutien aux factions rebelles, pouvant mener à un désordre au niveau de l'Empire. Les effets de l'espionnages sont également revus pour s'adapter à la vitesse du Jeu.
TEXT.German: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.Italian: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.

TEXT.English: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Your units can not enter %s1_cityName because it has the protection of its %s2_buildingName. Either destroy the %s3_buildingName, or reduce the city defenses to [COLOR_REVERT][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d4%[COLOR_REVERT][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] to attack the city.[COLOR_REVERT]

Détruisez [NUM3:le:la:les:les] %s3_buildingName, ou réduisez les défenses de la Ville à moins de [COLOR_REVERT][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d4%[COLOR_REVERT][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] pour la conquérir.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Your units can not enter this tile because it is inside of a nearby improvement's Zone of Control. Destroy the improvement, or it's defenders to restore normal movement.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vos unités ne peuvent entrer dans cette case car celle-ci fait partie de la zone protégée par un aménagement à proximité. Détruisez cet aménagement ou ces défenseurs afin de retrouver une liberté de mouvement dans ce périmètre.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Your units can not enter this tile because it is inside of a nearby city's Zone of Control. Capture the city to restore normal movement.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Unlocks a series of buildings, such as the moat, siege towers, and heavy gate, dedicated to expanding castles with key defense structures in your empire.
TEXT.French: Active une série de bâtiments dédiés à l'extension des châteaux (douves, tourelles, Porte, machicoulis,...) et constituant des structures clés dans la défense de votre Empire.
TEXT.German: Unlocks a series of buildings, such as the moat, siege towers, and heavy gate, dedicated to expanding castles with key defense structures in your empire.

TEXT.English: Unlocks two chains of buildings. One is designed to make arctic and cities in extreme latitudes stronger, the other designed to give your citizens access to city parks.
TEXT.French: Active deux groupes de bâtiments. Le premier est prévu pour donner un bonus aux Villes se situant dans des lattitudes extrêmes (arctique), le second regroupant des Parcs et autres aménagements urbains.
TEXT.German: Unlocks two chains of buildings. One is designed to make arctic and cities in extreme latitudes stronger, the other designed to give your citizens access to city parks.

TEXT.English: Allows the research of several meteorological technologies, which provide various city and military abilites, along with the construction of a National Weather Service.
TEXT.French: Permet la Découverte d'un certain nombre de technologie ayant attrait à la météorologie, qui confèrent des capacités supplémentaire aux Unités et aux Villes, ainsi que la construction d'un Service national de gestion Météo.

TEXT.Spanish: Allows the research of several meteorological technologies, which provide various city and military abilites, along with the construction of a National Weather Service.

TEXT.English: Allows the construction of a unique building that is unlocked for nearly every civic.
TEXT.French: Active la possibilité de construire des bâtiments spécifiques aux doctrines de votre Nation.
TEXT.German: Allows the construction of a unique building that is unlocked for nearly every civic.
TEXT.Italian: Allows the construction of a unique building that is unlocked for nearly every civic.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows the construction of a unique building that is unlocked for nearly every civic.

TEXT.English: Allows the construction of buildings designed for the very early game, as slower gamespeed games usually run out of things to build. Early buildings adds plenty of new early options, allow you to create infrastructure for city development.
TEXT.French: Active la possibilité de construire des bâtiments prévus pour le tout début du jeu, utile pour les vitesses de jeu Lentes. Cette option permet donc de construire et d'améliorer le développement des Villes.

TEXT.English: Historical Wonders adds A slew of historically significant wonders that were not included in RoM or BTS, like the World Trade Centers and the Terracotta Army.
